pkgmetadata.longdescription: Breaks Single Page Applications from 'flexdashboard' in Multiple Files // A drop-in replacement for 'flexdashboard' 'Rmd' documents, which implements an after-knit-hook to split the generated single page application in one document per main section to reduce rendering load in the web browser displaying the document. Put all 'JavaScript' stuff needed in all sections before the first headline featuring navigation menu attributes. This package is experimental and maybe replaced by a solution inside 'flexdashboard'.
